author: IGN
description: Meet Merlin and see the character in action in this latest Ravenswatch teaser trailer for the action roguelite game. Master of multiple schools of magic, he bends Nature, Arcane, and Sacred spells to reshape the battlefield. Merlin will be available in Ravenswatch in the new character DLC in January 2026 on Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch.
title: Ravenswatch - Official Merlin Reveal Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Marvel and DC have a lot riding on 2026. After a year that ranged from decent to disastrous, it’s tough to argue that “fatigue” isn’t a factor, but true believers are holding firm that next year will change everything. Spider-Man is going back to the streets, Supergirl is poised to build on Superman’s momentum, and all eyes are on Avengers: Doomsday – the ultimate test of Marvel’s remaining muscle.
The stage is set for box office redemption and a new path forward for superhero cinema. It’s the end of the post-post-pandemic era, a once-in-a-generation chance for a fresh start. If they mess this up, the genre might be truly cooked; next year could be the last chance to save comic book movies and shows from their flop era. That’s why we’re looking forward to 2026, the make-or-break year for superhero media.
One caveat before we begin: All dates are subject to change. Schedules can and likely will slip, but as far as we know, this is what’s on deck for 2026. So, let’s start with the main
title: 2026 Is a Make-or-Break Year for Superheroes | What to Expect From Marvel & DC in 2026

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at gameplay from Lost Host in this trailer for the upcoming 3D isometric action-adventure game. Can a toy car become the hero of a video game? One night, its owner mysteriously vanished without a trace. Left alone in the quiet room, this little car sets out on a spooky and mysterious journey - to find the boy. Lost Host will be available on PC in 2026.

#IGN #gaming
title: Lost Host - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: A Baby CEO?! is a small and silly resource management game. Mr. Bosu is the new boss of a struggling company and hasn't even learned how to talk yet! All you need to do is manage the budget, keep the company brand strong and make the employees happy. A Baby CEO?! will be available on Steam (Windows, Linux and Steam OS, Mac) in Q2 2026.
title: A Baby CEO?! - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Red Dead Redemption 2 compared to Mafia: The Old Country - there should be no contest. One is old, one is new, running on the very latest Unreal Engine technology, which promises unprecedented fidelity. So why are people still saying that, from a technical perspective, Red Dead Redemption 2 is still better?

Red Dead Redemption 2 came out 7 years ago, and is still technically impressive the best part of a decade later. It's built around one of the most detailed and immersive world simulations ever conceived, and its narrative chops easily elevate it to Rockstar's best work. It's the closest thing we have to a genuine masterpiece.

But after 7 years, it should be starting to show its age next to the latest AAA releases. Instead, the internet is awash with damning comparison videos that show, time and time again, that new games just aren't as good as Red Dead Redemption 2.

Is that really the case, though? And if so, why? Well... as ever, it's complicated.

#IGN #RedDeadRedemption2 #Maf
title: Red Dead 2 Comparison Videos Are Lying to You

author: IGN
description: Haunted by terrifying visions, Sarah's sleepwalking episodes begin to intensify, accelerating her descent into darkness.
title: Sleepwalker - Official Trailer (2026) Hayden Panettiere

author: IGN
description: Hold your breath as you witness revenge rise from the deep. After a life-shattering tragedy, Trish tries to comfort her best friend, Maddie, by taking her on a spectacular adventure in a private lagoon halfway across the world. Their peaceful retreat soon becomes a terrifying fight to stay alive when the ocean’s most bloodthirsty predator seeks vengeance for a brutal life in captivity. Virginia Garner and Mel Jarnson star in a thrill ride of a movie that will leave you breathless.
title: Killer Whale - Official Trailer (2026) Virginia Gardner, Mel Jarnson, Mitchell Hope
